Live.title: Live Shows
Live.picture1Content: Enjoy and recreate your senses with excellent mixes from our DJ's.
Live.picture2Content: Enjoy vibrant, exciting and joyful environments.

ThemeParties.title: Theme Parties
ThemeParties.content: Behold and join the exclusive theme parties in Cartagena with music, decorations, costumes and excellent prizes.

Crossover.title: Crossover
Crossover.content: Live Dj with the best fusion of rhythms and sounds to make you vibrate to the rhythm of the music.

item.question: What is the dress code at Skapate Hookah Bar?

aswer.content: Wear your best outfit, feel cool and comfortable, because our party goes on until sunrise. We do not allow any of the following:
We are open every day from 8:00 pm to 3:00 am. We are waiting for you.

item.question: What is the Skapate style party like?

aswer.content: Smile, dance to the rhythm of mysticism, activate your palate with flavors and sensations. Live the page and enjoy the best party.

item.question: Can I celebrate any special date?

aswer.content: Of course you can, just contact us at our number 300 4115807 and you are ready to go.

item.question: Can I find love, friends or dance partners?

aswer.content: Enter paradise with the best attitude and create unforgettable memories. Feel free to be you.

item.question: Do you sell all types of alcohol?

aswer.content: Don't let the party and the booze stop! We have the widest liquor menu, you can find from vodka, international beers, whiskey to sparkling wines.
